description: Removes columns whose name contains a string or matches a regular expression from a datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: A datatable from which the columns will be removed.

input.name: pattern
input.description: A string or a regular expression to be searched for within the column names. Regular expressions must be wrapped with / character (e.g. /.*/).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the columns matching the string or regular expression removed.

output.name: complementary
output.description: A datatable with the columns matching the string or regular expression kept.
